Excellent daytime and low light shooting and the video is just awesome. Starts up fast, shoots quickly, and the pictures are sharp.Only con is that it is larger than most point and shoot cameras and you'll need to flip up the flash manually but you will be happy with quality pictures and a quality camera. If you are ok with the size, buy this now!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!(infinity!)

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Dannie L Shannon
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and takes great pictures. 30X zoom brings is object from far way. Takes great pictures in low light conditions without a flash

Reviews.Content: Awesome camera, it is compact enough to carry and brings all the features of higher end quality cameras. It is just an amazing vamera

Reviews.Title: Love this camera

I thought it looked like my phone and kindle charger.  by the time I was nearly exasperatedI found the right charger and now all is right with the world.I love this camera.  not too complicated and great pictures.  I am not a professional sothis is all I needShirley.

Reviews.Content: The pictures come out clear and bright even in low light.  I chose this camera because it connects toThe internet.  I don't have to transfer with a cord to my computer.  It is a little difficult to access the right settings to transfer though.  The instructions in the manual are of no use.

Reviews.Title: great camara
Reviews.Author: honeybee
Reviews.Content: Clarity is amazing and it is not difficult at all to use, I also had a basic point and shoot, I am glad I took the next step.  Good job canon on another great product!!!

Reviews.Title: Attributes of amazing camera
Reviews.Author: Annie mae
Reviews.Content: I love my new  canon  camera...it's everything I wanted, from rechargeable battery, lightweight, amazing zoom and so many more features.

Reviews.Content: Bough as a gift, arrived next day and was exactlyas advertised. Have had other Canon equipment and this is a good camera for someone experienced or a beginner.

Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my wife to take to Los Cabos as her other camera gear was very expensive and very heavy to take with us. She was amazed at the capability of this little camera. It was perfect for whale watching and pictures throughout the trip. Incredible value at $200.

Reviews.Content: We had a Canon before and liked it but it was time for a new camera, so we chose Canon again.  I looked them all over a number of times, and I consulted Consumer Reports, and finally chose this one.  It seems to be a very good choice.

Reviews.Title: Great product but not happy with Amazon
Reviews.Author: Michael M Rumancik
Reviews.Content: This product performed as the reviews stated except I cannot synch the camera wireless (yet). I will contact Canon for help. What I am not happy about is Amazon stated if you purchase the camera from them you also receive a 16 gig memory card and case. I did not receive either and notice it was smoke and mirrors when looking back at the order page. All sellers can get feedback except Amazon.com which is interesting. They have dropped a huge notch in my book unless they make good on these items.

Reviews.Title: It's an okay indoor camera for the person that has never taken a picture.
Reviews.Author: William J. Sagaberd
Reviews.Content: If you like to take pictures outside this is NOT the model of camera to choose.  Without a view finder this camera is pretty much useless outdoors since the screen becomes completely obscured by moderate outside light.  If it's a clear sunny day you are not even able to tell if the camera is turned on or not unless you use BOTH hands to surround the screen to block all reflections.  Why is this relevant?  If you have to use BOTH hands in order to see the screen how do you depress the shutter button?  If you cannot see the screen in bright light how do compose your scene or see if it's in focus?The MACRO function is rather odd.  When you switch the camera to Macro shooting mode you are forced to high speed burst mode that only allows pictures up to 3 mega pixel. (That's a 75% reduction in picture quality.)  I've been through every single page of the new updated manual but have not found any way to disable the high speed burst mode when shooting in any mode except 100% automatic.  The firmware will not allow low-light pictures to be taken.  If the firmware decides the there is not enough light it will not allow a picture to be taken until the flash has been physically raised.Anther outdoor downfall of this camera is the proprietary Lithium Ion battery that can only be charged use 120v AC current. So if you are off the grid camping, hiking, or traveling away from North America plan on buying several extra batteries and budget your camera usage carefully.Very Important Safety Note:  The obnoxious bright green auto-focus assist beam cannot be turned off.  Which means you cannot use the camera at any indoor sporting events that prohibit flash photography.  I was ejected from three events. I finally realized it was the BRIGHT green auto-focus assist lamp that was drawing complaints from participants. Could not find an option to disable the beam, so I covered it up with a piece of dark colored tape.  When the beam is covered or blocked the camera will not even power on.  IF the beam is covered after power up it displays "HARDWARE FOCUS ERROR - Service required" then powers off.  You have to remove the battery, and also the small button cell battery that maintains the settings (CMOS) and clock before the camera will turn on again.  This also explains there the extreme red-eye effect in every picture of people whether or not the flash was used, this includes animals also.  Pretty bad when you are getting red-eye effect in pictures of birds outdoors.  This also explains why road signs, reflective clothing, and reflective signage all appear as directly illuminated even in bright sunlight.  It seems the beam is illuminated just before, during, and briefly after the exposure of the picture.  Why?This is not a photographer friendly camera, it's seems to be entirely designed for people that have never taken a picture before and do not understand what is causing the conditions I'm describing.  The optics of this Canon camera are exceptional, but the operating system of the camera renders them pretty much useless.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use and Takes Great Pictures!
Reviews.Author: PB&Jam
Reviews.Content: I am no photographer but I wanted a camera that took really nice pictures without me having to learn a special skill set. This one does the job. It's also just the right size. We inherited a large Canon Rebel and we never end up using it because who wants to lug around a giant camera in a huge bag when they're out and about enjoying life? Not me. Plus, I never figured out how to get the right settings for different shots. This one makes me feel like a pro without the hassle.

Reviews.Title: richard
Reviews.Author: richard
Reviews.Content: This camera is a good buy and very easy to use even for a beginner like me and it takes a good picture which is great to have

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Ashley Murray
Reviews.Content: The camera is great. I love all the settings. I didn't like that I had to find the actual manual online, but it wasn't that big of a deal to cost a star. Shipping was fast and easy. Would recommend the camera for someone who wants an every day point and shoot. Even when you zoom in close, the picture is still great.

Reviews.Author: Francofou
Reviews.Content: The camera seems to work well, but if you have been using the Canon ImageBrowser 5 for storing photos, you should know that this camera is incompatible with it.  Read the reviews of the ImageBrowser EX on Canon's site: [...]

Reviews.Title: very nice camera
Reviews.Author: wee baker
Reviews.Content: this is a VERY nice camera!! We really love it. Very simple to use, but has lots of features! Would recommend it to anyone!

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: Patty Hafer "hotgrandma"
Reviews.Content: It takes excellent pictures even though I have tremors.  The camera is light weight. The battery seems to last a loony time.

Reviews.Title: A very compact, versatile camera with a surprisingly good zoom lens
Reviews.Author: DANIEL M.
Reviews.Content: This is a very compact, versatile camera with a surprisingly good zoom lens. I have gotten some excellent shots even at full zoom length in bright sunlight.  It allows for full manual control including manual focus.  Picture quality very much depends on how much light is available.  Above ISO 200 to 400 grain is very noticeable.  As with any camera, if you are going for high quality pictures you'll have to work around its limitations.  Don't expect DSLR performance, but do expect a well-designed point-and-shoot camera with a high-powered zoom lens and full manual controls.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: S. P. Lewin "PL"
Reviews.Content: Great camera, awesome pictures and portable size.Would have liked to be able to choose lower pixels so <i can get more pictures but has very limited sizes.Did not come with a USB cable to transfer pictures to computer or a cable to connect to  TV.Update: Had to exchange the camera since after a week of use the camera would no longer receive the memory card, the spring broke and I keep getting a memory read error.

Reviews.Title: OK for snap shots!
Reviews.Author: Cornell Drentea "Cornell"
Reviews.Content: Seems OK for snap shots with flash, but has some problems with focusing in nature shots; Pictures are not sharp enough and exposure is not correct. Zoom is useful, however using it at 30x is very demanding in stability. Hard to use to catch action shots. What you see is not what you get due to processing delays.

Reviews.Title: nice camera!
Reviews.Author: Clemence Delpon de Vaux
Reviews.Content: It's not too big and take great picture and it's also a very good price, afordable for a good camera!

Reviews.Title: Finally, the camera we've been looking for
Reviews.Author: Father Time "I wait for no man, but several w...
Reviews.Content: For a long time we bought decent digital cameras, rather than really good ones, because of price. And as prices came down, we'd get a little better camera - usually Canons. Last year, we decided we wanted, and could afford the next step up - a Nikon J1. Long story short - nice pix, short battery life, too much stuff to drag around.This year we decided that we wanted to see if there was something available at a reasonable price, that could take almost as good pictures as the Nikon, but was handier to take on vacation (no lens switching). I AM SO HAPPY I FOUND THIS ONE!! (Sorry, I hate all caps, but that's really how I feel.)The pictures are incredible. I only used flash as a 'just in case' backup picture, but the non-flash pictures are all better. I've never seen such nice lowlight resolution in a moderately priced camera.The zoom is INCREDIBLE. I hope to post a couple pix that show its range. And though I tried hard to be still for long range shots, I don't have the steadiest of hands, but the anti-shake in this camera is ... yes, incredible.The battery life is all that I needed. I took about 100 shots a day and used the zoom a LOT, and only had to change the battery every day and a half. (I bought a spare for that very purpose.)I love the flash popup - so simple, yet so effective.Here are my little nitpicky cons: The zoom feels a bit rough at high speed. The macro function could be a bit better. I don't think it comes with a wrist strap. That's it.

Reviews.Title: luv luv luv
Reviews.Author: Kt
Reviews.Content: This is such an awesome camera!!!!!  Bought it for my son - going to buy one foe myself!!  Luv Luv Luv

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Pastor Tony
Reviews.Content: Thank you very much. My wife has been dreaming of a real nice affordable camera. Thank you again. Works great.

Reviews.Title: Thoroughly enjoying this camera
Reviews.Author: mark zimmerman
Reviews.Content: I only wish they would have included an operator's manual, not just the manual for the WiFi feature which I most likely will never use.

Reviews.Title: The Best Yet in Point & Shoot Canon's
Reviews.Author: Vicki E. Bessent
Reviews.Content: A person who has been using a Canon S5 IS for over 6 years, the new Canon SX510 HS has alot of whatyou want. Also tells you how well the Canon S5 IS has fit my needs. Only buying the SX 510 for the extra power to catch Wild Life..This new camera has a 30 X Optical vs the old Canon S5 had a 12 X.12 Pixels is a good all round number. Have been using 8 MP for along time and found it plenty.Only part I miss is the Eye View Finder. The new camera has a 3" Screen. This always presents a problem when shooting in sun.No matter the camera, having only a Screen on the back, is about the only draw back of these kind of cameras.For size, excellent. You could call it a Mini Full Size Camera.Weight: wise:  excellent. Has the square flat battery. Although, still think the double A's are good. And easy to find vs the flat types. Have extras.If you have any knowledge of past Canon's, you should be able to zip right through the settings.Easy to have around in crowds. No large lens hanging off the camera. You can catch anything in a distance without an extra lens.The 30 Optical is enough for me, without any wiggle. Have yet to figure why people need Digital Powers.This camera is a must. Especially if you do have the larger cameras with all the lens. Such a compact camera.After this many years of being in the S5, all the Upgrades are Great!

Reviews.Title: Thoroughly enjoying this camera
Reviews.Author: mark zimmerman
Reviews.Content: I only wish they would have included an operator's manual, not just the manual for the WiFi feature which I most likely will never use.

Reviews.Title: The Best Yet in Point & Shoot Canon's
Reviews.Author: Vicki E. Bessent
Reviews.Content: A person who has been using a Canon S5 IS for over 6 years, the new Canon SX510 HS has alot of whatyou want. Also tells you how well the Canon S5 IS has fit my needs. Only buying the SX 510 for the extra power to catch Wild Life..This new camera has a 30 X Optical vs the old Canon S5 had a 12 X.12 Pixels is a good all round number. Especially if you do have the larger cameras with all the lens. Such a compact camera.After this many years of being in the S5, all the Upgrades are Great!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Peanut
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived on time and works perfectly. It is incredible small for a camera and the zoom amazed me. It's perfect to carry with me everywhere I go, I'm very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Shnrz
Reviews.Content: Takes great vibrant pictures. Lots of functions (manual, program, scenes and auto among many others) and still easy enough to use for beginners. Used it a lot and tested it under many different conditions during the holidays (low light, flash, sunny, cloudy, beach, sports). Really good zoom. Lightweight. Good battery life. When using flash, camera may be a little slow to shoot sometimes (around 2.5 seconds). Really good video quality. I was initially drawn to this model because of the wifi. Even though uploading through wifi is simple enough, there is no "select all" function, so you're forced to select the photos one-by-one in order to upload (big PITA when uploading 100+ photos). Notice this model doesn't have a viewfinder (I don't mind, but maybe you would).

Reviews.Title: Ita a good camera
Reviews.Author: Lobna Sameer
Reviews.Content: The quality of photos is not great but it gives you manual control options along with automatic options so you can experiment an learn photography. Its also light and small and the battery life is good

Reviews.Title: Canon SX510 HS
Reviews.Author: TeLeBo
Reviews.Content: A great camera for a point and shoot guy like me.  The WIFI download of photos is not as easy as I would have guessed.  Still trying to figure that out.  I think most users manuals are written by the folks that know the products too well.

Reviews.Title: Good camera.
Reviews.Author: Charles Moyer
Reviews.Content: Performs just as expected. I have no issues with the quality or performance of this camera. Good camera for everyday use.

Reviews.Title: Better Than I Expected
Reviews.Author: Charles Philpott
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera based on the positive reviews.  I was looking for a point and shoot that would provide better zoom capabilities.I am not disappointed.  Great camera and a great price.

Reviews.Title: Powershot SX510
Reviews.Author: Heli flyer
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for a specific purpose. A Med Cruise and tour of Rome. I have other more expensive cameras, but this fit my need. I took over 2000 pictures and the camera never failed. I can't say as much for my picture taking. This is a great little camera that I would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: Camera Cord
Reviews.Author: bcote
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, it takes great pictures and it is easy to use, but it didn't come with a cord that connects the camera to your computer to download the pictures.  The manuel talks about the cord and tells you how to download.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: A J L "Silver Fox"
Reviews.Content: Great camera. easy to use and download to computer for saving or printing. many extra features. reasonably priced for what your getting.

Reviews.Title: WOW!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Franniefoot
Reviews.Content: I am a novice photographer. If you can even call me that, but I am having a wonderful time with my Canon PowerShot SX510 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera.  I can take a picture of my flowers and see a water droplet nesting in the deepest recesses of them.  My Moonstone Rose is beautiful.  I wish I could attach a picture to prove what I am saying.The reviews mentioned some distortion when using the 30x Optical Zoom.  For the novice....I can't see it.This Camera is great for me

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Lucas bustle
Reviews.Content: Camera is great for still photos or even when capturing distant objects the zoom can easily snap a clear photo. The video was amazing quality especially when plugging it into the tv. had no problem carrying this around for a day of capturing video and pictures its the perfect size. would recommend to anyone looking for a camera.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Dr. M
Reviews.Content: Works great out of the box as a point and shoot camera.  However, in auto mode, the hue can be on the green side if there is a outside window with sunshine or  a light bulb within the frame you are trying to shoot. Can't wait to see what I can do with it once I have time to study the directions.

Reviews.Title: catches great photos
Reviews.Author: sell fell
Reviews.Content: this camera is worked pretty well for me when I went on vacation to the Bahamas, I caught some insane photos of the island. Even thought his camera is kind of expensive to some degree its still worth the price tag.

Reviews.Title: The camera is cool
Reviews.Author: Pedro Navarrete
Reviews.Content: Very fast, the resolution, colours, video and all options are great... Recommended for always people, easy of use, very compact...

Reviews.Title: this is the best camera I have ever owned
Reviews.Author: Kristin Steffen
Reviews.Content: this little camera is responsive, user friendly, lightweight, and compact.  I am quite impressed with the quality of this affordable wi-fi equipped camera.

Reviews.Title: my canon carmera
Reviews.Author: evelyn. vetnon
Reviews.Content: This camera does it all I really love every thing about this camera this price was reasonably it is easy to handle just a clear shot  video are so clear

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: Dawn Dooley
Reviews.Content: I did some research to find a good camera with a decent price and this one met all the criteria. I'm glad I went with this one. It takes beautiful, clear shots and is not too heavy or bulky. Good camera for a good price..

Reviews.Title: no viewfinder
Reviews.Author: Katie Mclane
Reviews.Content: Without a viewfinder, it is hard to take photos in the bright sun.  I just got it, so I'm no expert yet, but one thing is that the battery/card compartment has an unlock button that is not really easy to open.  New style, I guess.  It is good that it has a lens cap rather than the iris opening because they eventually stop opening and closing, or get stuck in between.  The photos I have taken are ok so far.

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: Dawn Dooley
Reviews.Content: I did some research to find a good camera with a decent price and this one met all the criteria. I'm glad I went with this one. It takes beautiful, clear shots and is not too heavy or bulky. Good camera for a good price..

Reviews.Title: no viewfinder
Reviews.Author: Katie Mclane
Reviews.Content: Without a viewfinder, it is hard to take photos in the bright sun.  I just got it, so I'm no expert yet, but one thing is that the battery/card compartment has an unlock button that is not really easy to open.  New style, I guess.  It is good that it has a lens cap rather than the iris opening because they eventually stop opening and closing, or get stuck in between.  The photos I have taken are ok so far.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Bryce McGuire
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my decade old 2.3 MP compact, and the difference is amazing. The photos are gorgeous. There are plenty of settings, but you can use it on auto just fine. It is lightweight and is perfect for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Good ratio cost/benefits
Reviews.Author: Javier
Reviews.Content: This camera I selected for my wife in her birthday. They love it since she saw it. There are too many types of easy options for pictures that no need to be an expert to perform. The low light pictures are very good as well as the zoom.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Tina Kallaher
Reviews.Content: I was a little disappointed that it did not come with a memory card or an instruction manual. I believe for the price those should have been items to be included. With that being said, I love the camera. My mom and I were driving the other day and I just pointed at passing cars and the clarity and crispness of the shot was amazing. I also took a picture of a star and the clarity of that without the flash was incredible. I would definitely recommend this camera for first time photographers.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Jessie M. Thomas "Jess Toms"
Reviews.Content: So I got this little camera to take quck snap shots while filming for personal use. I love this little camera, it is compact enough to toss in a bad and run but powerful enough to take beautiful shots and 1080p video is clear and clean. Audio isn't as amazing, but that is to be expected. And an added bonus, machine washable charger!! Okay, well maybe not intentionally. But I accidentally put my charger threw the wash and, after sticking it in a bag of rich for 24 hours, it works just fine!My family and I are long time canon owners and users with a t3i, t5i, S120, XF 100, and XF 305.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: K. Byrnes
Reviews.Content: Great camera, great pictures. The wireless sending of pictures to the computer is totally mystifying, but it's easy enough to transfer the pictures via the disk.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: BlueDad
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my wife cause our old point and shoot finally died.  She wanted another basic point and shoot and I wanted an SLR, so we compromised and got this one.  We have already took many pics and many videos.  The HD videos look great for what it is and the pics are great too.  The WiFi feature is easy to connect and the software that you can download from the Canon website makes it a breeze.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Point and Shot Camera
Reviews.Author: Karen Ellis "Nana's 6 girls"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera the pictures are awesome it has Wi-Fi so you can send pictures as soon as you take them.  The 30x zoom is clear.  You can take video but I haven't tried that feature yet.  I recommend this little gem to anyone as it is so easy to use.  All in all I would purchase this again.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: CB "CB"
Reviews.Content: This doesn't look or act like your typical point and shoot camera but it's very easy to use and I have no problems with it.  It's not the kind of camera you can slip in your pocket obviously but it is a nice size.  My only complaint might be how washed out the photos look when using the flash and you really need the flash all the time indoors to prevent the motion blur.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: RAGHAVENDRA
Reviews.Content: I wanted a "pleasant" camera that was trouble-free to use. This camera takes good quality pictures! I particularly wanted a camera that works fine in low light since the cheap cameras I have now are terrible with that. We were able to take good photos in front of the tree with only the tree lights on and they turned out grand!

Reviews.Title: A great Camera for for those hoping to step up without shelling out!
Reviews.Author: Jerome skinner
Reviews.Content: Amazing performance for a reasonable price. The zoom is tremendous and the color is bright, clear and focused. Even an old guy like me appreciates the wi-fi!  Not just an ordinary point and shot.

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures
Reviews.Author: Angela Schmitz
Reviews.Content: Not hard to learn at all!  Having a great time with it and can't wait to take it on vacation.

Reviews.Title: nice little camera
Reviews.Author: compassrose "compassrose"
Reviews.Content: This camera takes much better pictures than I expected! I use it for birding and if the bird suits still I get good photos

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: J. McDonald "Fritziebaby"
Reviews.Content: this replaced an older Panasonic Lumix, which was a really fine camera, but it does so much more, at a reasonable price, that it is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: cannon sx510 hs
Reviews.Author: Bradley J. Clarke
Reviews.Content: so far this is a very good and reliable instument, took a lil figure in it out but is great, love the telephoto on it, having to download and print 168 pges of how to's off the internet is a pain but it is worth it thanks

Reviews.Title: This is just sufficient for my needs
Reviews.Author: Bala N. Aiyer
Reviews.Content: For a casual photographer it is good and easy to use.People who look for more sophistications need to spend ten tomes moreThis is good for most of us.

Reviews.Title: LOVE
Reviews.Author: Theresa L. Marthey
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!!!  Still working through the manual, but I have been able to take some great pictures to submit to the local newspaper with my job.  Don't get to submit photos very often, but when I do, they will be good.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't blow us away but works fine
Reviews.Author: Melissa M Stock
Reviews.Content: This has some nice features, but we still need to work with it a bit to come up with the perfect setting. Love the fact that we don't even have to connect to computer to get photos.

Reviews.Title: Powershot camera works fantastic
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: I dropped our old camera and had to replace it, this was an upgrade to our current camera and we love it. It takes great pictures and the zoom is awesome. Works great for Marching Band events.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't blow us away but works fine
Reviews.Author: Melissa M Stock
Reviews.Content: This has some nice features, but we still need to work with it a bit to come up with the perfect setting. Love the fact that we don't even have to connect to computer to get photos.

Reviews.Title: Powershot camera works fantastic
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: I dropped our old camera and had to replace it, this was an upgrade to our current camera and we love it. It takes great pictures and the zoom is awesome. Works great for Marching Band events.

Reviews.Title: Highest recommendation
Reviews.Author: Anthony M.
Reviews.Content: I'm not a tech type and I appreciate the excellent quality and ease of use with this camera.  It has excellent stats across the board and my highest recommendations.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: kevin
Reviews.Content: Perfect camera. Great photos and videos. Thumbs up all the way. And its a small compact build. Recommend this camera to any one.

Reviews.Title: Hubby Loves It!!
Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: Christmas purchase for Hubby and he loves it!!, especially the Wi-Fi capability and rechargeable battery!  With his previous camera, he had to replace batteries after taking a FEW pictures, which was annoying and costly, so it's great to have an awesome camera with a rechargeable battery.  The camera takes excellent pictures and video and is very easy to use.  Highly recommended!!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera !
Reviews.Author: S. Mitchell "samintx"
Reviews.Content: Don't get me wrong. I am not maven when it comes to cameras. I have several and rejected Canon a few years back because I thought it was for experts and have a huge learning curve. Well, I was wrong! I have a 25X Panasonic SLR and the zoom of this 30x cannot compare with the 25X. Even without doing a full Zoom the Canon has such a greater capable ZOOM it is amazing. At 30X full out it is like having a telescopic lens!The controls are easy. I am learning the ones I'm going to use (limited for the camera fan but my brain won't hold all the settings) ALSO, this camera besides outdoing my Panasonic SLR 25X is 1/2 the weight! I got a harness for the SLR but with this little Canon Gem I don't need it because it isn't any heavier than a point and shoot but so much more capable.I think I agree with the reviewer that said the aftermarket batteries last longer than the Canon batteries that came with the camera. I bought the set, also because I don't want to miss a shot.Hurray! am I a happy camper with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX510
Reviews.Author: Myrnah Piggott
Reviews.Content: I find my camera compact and designed to fit in you hand. Very clear picture , love the zoom and very simply to operate. It fits my needs very well and would definitely recommend it to friends if they are in the market to purchase a new camera.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THE 30X OPTICAL ZOOM
Reviews.Author: Ms. Lee
Reviews.Content: I PURCHASED THIS AS AN UPGRADE FROM MY CANNON POWERSHOT BECAUSE I WANTED A MORE PROFESSIONAL MODEL FOR MY PICTURE TAKING. I HAVE NOT USED IT EXTENSIVELY ENOUGH TO GIVE ANY CONS YET BUT EXPECT TO DURING THE SUMMER WHEN TRAVELING.  I WILL UPDATE THIS RATING IF ANYTHING SIGNIFICANTLY BAD IS DISCOVERED.  SOME PROS ARE IS THAT IT IS LIGHT, VERY LIGHT WEIGHT. IT DOES A WONDERFUL JOB WITH THE 30X + ZOOM. I HAVE TO LEARN TO USE THE OTHER MODES FOR VARIOUS LIGHTING, ETC. HOWEVER, IF THAT DOESN'T WORK OUT...AUTO IS ALWAYS THE BEST TO USE.  THE CAMERA IS AS DESCRIBED, NEW AND, WAS DELIVERED INTACT IN PROTECTION PACKAGING AND IN WORKING CONDITION.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: j. dana Brown
Reviews.Content: For the price I can't be more pleased with the SX510 HS.  Great photos, awesome zoom and all the setting you could ask for.  Only issue I have had is the manual flash.  Other PowerShots I've owned have had a auto pop up flash.  Other than the flash issue I highly recommend the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great CAmera!
Reviews.Author: Manuel Ruiz Mendez
Reviews.Content: Great camera with a low price, excellent image quality and a great resolution for a cheap price. Also have the wifi option to backup your photos in your computer.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera and company that stands behind it's product
Reviews.Author: Wildflowers & Finery "Susan"
Reviews.Content: This is the third Canon I have purchased and all three still work. The first is a film camera that I almost never use anymore digital is just too convenient. The second is an old Power Shot S500 that started taking bad photos after six years, it turned out to be a recall problem, I sent it and they fixed and returned it all for free. I purchased this one because the Power Shot S500 is just a bit outdated now. I have found it easy to use, the photos come out great and the size and weight is good. It took a bit of time to set the camera to computer set up but running the camera is easy. The photo quality is very good but I do think that real film captures depth better digital is always a little flat. I was a little concerned about the size not fitting in my purse but it is lightweight and not that bulky.

Reviews.Title: amazing zoom
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing if you need to zoom in from far away.  We are happy with its performance so far

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my Wife as a Christmas gift. She tells me she loves it. It take great pictures and the zoom is great. the only thing she is having a problem with is the wifi, but the main reason she wanted this camera is for the zoom. So far she is very happy with it

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Rex Rizz
Reviews.Content: This camera is so nice to work with and the image stabilizer system that built into it, allows you to shoot very smooth camera scenes even walking with it, without the handheld shake that normally goes with that kind of shot....that blew my away!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Pablo Saavedra
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my point and shoot and so far it has exceeded my expectations. Great zoom, great picture quality and shoots great videos too.

Reviews.Title: My wife is happy
Reviews.Author: Christopher Speno
Reviews.Content: its just what my wife wanted. Its fairly straight forward. I haven't used the wifi feature yet though. Good quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful purchase
Reviews.Author: Leah Ann McLurkin
Reviews.Content: Birthday gift for my son.  He absolutely loves it.  It has wifi so it loads all pictures right on to his phone quickly and easily.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: Al Nila
Reviews.Content: The power shot is everything I thought it would be, a very good item for the price.We take it everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX510 HS 12
Reviews.Author: Wendell Dawson "WT Daws"
Reviews.Content: I like this camera and have used it already during Christmas.  It makes clear pictures.  I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Just right!
Reviews.Author: Susan Barre
Reviews.Content: my daughter adores this camera that i gave her for Christmas.  it does so much more than her simple point and shoot but is not so complex that she can't operate it!  what a win!

Reviews.Title: Great product better price
Reviews.Author: Michael LaMarca
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend had been eyeing this camera for a while before Santa got it for her for Xmas. She loves it's "fun-size", wifi capability, sharing features and learning all the different picture settings. Definitely earned me some serious points! Thanks Canon ;)

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift for 14 year old son
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann
Reviews.Content: He is loving it and finding it easy to use takes great sharp pictures  in low light and outside.  Compared to his simple nikon cool pics this camera takes much better pictures.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: Is a nice camera portable, exelent zoom, like to send photos to the smartphone by aplication on the app store

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: shon tally
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures, easy to use....you don't need a PHD to operate...I would recommend it to anyone who takes a lot of photos and doesn't want to sink hundreds of dollars in a camera.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Giovanna
Reviews.Content: Beautiful camera! Works wonders I can tell you that! Love using it. The pictures come out beautifully! Worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: canon
Reviews.Author: Jerry H Garland
Reviews.Content: I am amateur photographer who has had limited experience with point and shoot cameras but I really like this one.  I looked at another brand at a big-box store and the sales person highly recommended the Canon.I have been an Amazon customer for several years so I had no problem ordering the camera from them.  Good choice.

Reviews.Title: Rating my new Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: Eddie S
Reviews.Content: Its an awesome camera, The 30 times zoom is amazing! Can't wait to use it more! The pictures I took came out awesome!!!

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX 510
Reviews.Author: Visa
Reviews.Content: This camera is exactly what I was looking for. Tired of the big cameras since all I need is a good point and shoot. This SX 510 is perfect. Haven't taken many pictures yet but will update a little later.

Reviews.Title: Simple but good quality.
Reviews.Author: MMagee
Reviews.Content: WOW great camera for the money! We have been struggling to find a middle of the road camera that can take a wide range of pictures well and this one dose it. So if your a novice parent like myself who wants to take some decent indoor or outdoor pictures of family events in my opinion this is the best deal around. Its not a pro camera, but the features are simple to use, the battery last a long time, it takes quick photos, and it doesn't weigh a million pounds so carrying it around the zoo or sporting events isn't a chore.

Reviews.Title: For the price who can tell the difference.
Reviews.Author: DICollege
Reviews.Content: I have to admit, I am not a very avid photographer and until now have only used my cell phone and Ipod cameras. I think that for the price, this is exceptionally a great camera and who can ask for more. Does one need anything else unless a professional photographer? I say not. You will be pleased with this camera as I am. EXCELLENT PICTURE quality. And video that is better than blue ray discs.

Reviews.Title: Nice PowerShot…
Reviews.Author: R. J. Sorensen "Album Art Junkie"
Reviews.Content: Cannon stuff is just top notch by me. I got this as a backpack special, field camera for places I don't want to take my 5dIII and lenses. I still want a good photograph, even in very dusty, dirty day hikes. This Canon is what we chose for our lightweight backpack kit. It is nice. Love the pictures from my "in harms way" shooter.

Reviews.Title: Nice Photos for SLOW objects
Reviews.Author: John W. Ellis II "jellis"
Reviews.Content: My pictures are clear and detailed - as long as the subject doesn't move. Otherwise, the shutter speed will give you blurry pix.

Reviews.Title: Great Vaule
Reviews.Author: K. Benoit "K B"
Reviews.Content: This product is nearing the end of it's life cycle and is being sold at a great price point. For less than $250 you can have a camera that takes great pictures right out of the box. If you just want a simple to use camera that takes great photos while being very easy to use then this is your camera. I think that it will really impress anyone moving up from a simple point and shoot while still offering the easy of point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX510 HS 12.1 MP
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: I really liked this camera, the only thing I was not crazy about was that the color in your pictures was not the true color, purple came out navyblue, etc. Otherwise, I loved the wide angle LCD, the zoom was great... Good lowlight!

Reviews.Title: Order the USB Cable when you order the camera or you'll be disappointed
Reviews.Author: Kathleen A. Wilson
Reviews.Content: I wanted to surprise my husband for Christmas with a camera and all the necessary accessories.  After doing research online, this camera was 'best fit' for his needs.  With the assistance of Amazon's 'you might be interested' feature I ordered software, SIM card, and carrying case.  I do not recall reading ANYWHERE in the features/benefit or specification page that a CANON-SPECIFIC USB cable did not accompany the camera, or I would have automatically ordered the cable.My husband has just spent over two (2) hours with the camera, computer, and different USB cables attempting to download the software onto his computer.  The message indicates 'no device detected';  needless to say he's frustrated.  I came back to the Amazon site and looked up the camera and saw a USB Cable for this camera; usually under $20, on sale for $5.75.  Not a problem except we live in Hawaii (not eligible for PRIME) and the shipping will cost more than the RETAIL price of the cable; not to mention shipping time.Bottom line:  camera is ready to go, software is ready to go, without a CANON-specific USB cable, nothing's going to happen.  It's like buying a car, only to discover that before you drive it away, you'll need to buy the car keys.I strongly urge Canon to include the cable with the camera, whether you choose to charge extra is a no-brainer to reduce customer frustration (read customer reviews under Canon SX510 USB Cable).  From a marketing perspective, it's little things like this that could be prevented if you looked at the impact of total customer experience.Will submit an additional review ONCE THE CAMERA is up and running with downloaded software in the computer.  In the meantime, we'll just set all the parts/pieces aside and wait for a week or more until the USB cable arrives; then we'll repeat the installation/set up process.  Hopefully my next review will be glowing, positive, and include more stars!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Norman L. Steiner
Reviews.Content: I have owned a number of Canon cameras over the years and for a inexpensive point and shoot camera, this is one of the best so far.  Hard to believe the features that this little camera has especially the range of the lens i.e. 28mm to nearly 700 mm. telephoto .  Great for photos in extremely low light situations without a flash too.

Reviews.Title: Great Shots at a Compact price
Reviews.Author: Shyam Amladi
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with this camera--I would give it 5 stars, but just started using it and have not gone through many of its technical options like shooting in low light etc.It has a superb optical zoom capability and is takes sharp, clear pictures. Great to handle.Couple of negatives--nothing to do with the camera itself. 1) It does not come with a carrier case, so you have to find and pay for one. 2) The lens does not recess, so it is a bit awkward to fit into a carry-bag which means you have to lug it around and 3) I wish they had an attachment for a wide angle lens.

Reviews.Title: It's not bad. One thing though
Reviews.Author: M. Rutter "LovetoRead"
Reviews.Content: Don't get me wrong I would take the t3i over this any day. But if you are a budget filmer or budget photographer. This camera will do.It's lightweight, it's compact, and it takes killer video and photos.If I would say one bad thing about it I would say how it does not have a way to plug in an external mic. I am taking videos on this camera and the built in mic is pretty bad. I would love if there was a way to plug in an external mic. But hey, thats what you're going to get for a 200$ camera right.

Reviews.Title: Shot video and snapped some nice pictures so far
Reviews.Author: Gary Boyden
Reviews.Content: Bought a similar one for my wife a few years ago, she got it in the divorce. Shot video and snapped some nice pictures so far.

Reviews.Title: It is a great camera!
Reviews.Author: paul smith
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed the use of this great camera...It is simple and easy to use, and the pictures turn out very nice.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my wife- she loves it!
Reviews.Author: Michael Moorman
Reviews.Content: As stated above, this camera was a gift for my wife. She loves everything about it. I would recommend this for any beginning photographer.

Reviews.Title: Love this Canon
Reviews.Author: Karen Moldovan
Reviews.Content: I love this Canon camera!  I plan to take many photo's with this camera! It's not big and bulky, but takes great pictures and has a wonderful zoom.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera.
Reviews.Author: Marcia England
Reviews.Content: A friend of mind had one on a recent trip to Costa Rica.  The bird and flower pictures were amazing.  Love the 30x zoom.

Reviews.Title: Love it, love it, love it!
Reviews.Author: Marissa Garcia
Reviews.Content: This was my Christmas gift to ME.  I ordered  it specifically for the WiFi and because of the Canon quality. It truly lives up to its name. I am very happy that I made this purchase. I tried other cameras, but I should've just stuck with Canon. They're the best!

Reviews.Title: Perfect Amatuer Camera!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Evans "pkenny"
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my daughter and it is everything she could've asked for! She is picky and wanted something beyond a Point-n-Shoot, but still easy to use for a 6 year-old.

Reviews.Title: too small for big hands
Reviews.Author: Red and Suzie
Reviews.Content: This should be fine for avg. size person, but football player size, not enough finger room in the grip. ok

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: ioBuddha
Reviews.Content: I needed an inexpensive camera for weekend road trips. I did not want to lug my DSLR around with me while visiting various bars and such. This Canon takes very nice shots and is compact enough to bring in anywhere. Great zoom and image quality is better than I thought it would be.

Reviews.Title: New camera in for repair to Canon after only two months
Reviews.Author: ShooFly Pie
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to buy this camera since I've always been a fan of Canon products.  I am not a professional photographer but do use a camera weekly for various projects around the house and also on vacations.  Everything worked fine until one day, two months into my ownership, the camera would no longer download pictures to my computer.  I contacted Canon and they had me send it to them for repair.  Yesterday I received an email informing me that they cannot repair my camera and would be replacing it with either a new or refurbished camera.  In early December, I paid over $200 for my camera and I certainly expect a new camera from Canon.  I'll update this review when the situation with Canon is resolved.  Until then, my rating stays as is.

Reviews.Title: It a Nice Camera.
Reviews.Author: Pauline
Reviews.Content: Its a really nice camera, but it is a step down from my Canon PowerShot SX410 HS. It will do the job I need it to do.

Reviews.Title: a bit too small
Reviews.Author: Bambs
Reviews.Content: I hope this camera will take decent pictures... but it is very small for anyone who has large hands.A bit hard to hold.Good zoom.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera. Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Tyler Andreasen
Reviews.Content: I don't have much to say, because I am not an expert on photography, but I have been totally pleased by the performance, feel, and quality of this camera.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: olaiza pacheco
Reviews.Content: love u is the mejor product, is the more perfect, i like it mire thanks love u more you like

Reviews.Title: wireless issues
Reviews.Author: Marcio Luiz Goulart
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is excellent , very fast, the  30 x zoom is marvellous and the manual settings are easy to operateIt's not as heavy as a DSRL, the battery life is good,It's not a pocket size camera, but it is not difficult to carryThe bad issue - wireless features - you only can upload photos (  using wireless )to social networks as facebook if you register atcanon website and if you live in the USA....Something they should inform  before you buy it.Yes you can upload the images to your computer with wireless connection since you have a  HD screen in your computer or notebook.The wireless features are somehow difficult to set and useless if you live outside the USA or you don't have  HD computer (1028x724)If you won't use wireless and dont mind about a full HD movies save money and buy a SX500HS

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot SX510 Camera
Reviews.Author: A. S. Jones
Reviews.Content: This is one of the most beautiful cameras , easy to use light to carry and very good. love it. canon did a good job with this model. I will recommend it to anyone who is a beginner in photography like myself.

Reviews.Title: great personal camera
Reviews.Author: bobbie
Reviews.Content: I am a professional and i really like this camera for use on anything it would be great to carry with you as a pro it is small and takes awesome pictures and for the price it is a high quality camera affordable for any type of user.The zoom lens everytime amazes me, I used it for low light the other night it could have worked a bit easier but it mainly was because i did not read the manual first but I was still able to get a bunch of good pictures of the lunar eclipse. I am confident with reading the manual i would have been able to overcome the minor issues related mostly to the lense and aperature]. No biggie it still passed. I would hoghly recomend this camera. It is not my first Cannon and it wont be my last. Within arms reach i have over 10000 dollars in cannon equipment and i have never had any problems with my Cannon gear accept one time i was late for a flight and at the wrong place at the airport i decided to run to my final call gate and from no were I was tackled by two security officers football style and kinda of bent the camera body of my AE-1 but it still worked and the telephoto zoom i had on it that day was fine to. It kinda sucked the security department kept the camera for a month but returned it with a check for the damage.When I sent to cannon for the repairs they said it was covered by some crazy warantee so it cost me nothing to fix plus a thousand buck from North West Air apologizing for the whole thing,That is awesome for everyone.One more thing football players should have there cameras mounted on their helmets just in case those security guards are still out there,. Im just saying.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX510 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Optical Zoom...
Reviews.Author: Lloyd French
Reviews.Content: Canon PowerShot SX510 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Optical Zoom... Nice and does what I need it to do

Reviews.Title: First Camera
Reviews.Author: Yvonne M. Abhyankar
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a first camera for my granddaughter.  She has been using the camera on her iPhone.  I hope she will find the additional possibilities available with a real camera interesting.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: verl
Reviews.Content: got this for my wife she seems to love it so all is good does take great pics  would recommend to anyone looking for a decent camera

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Qi Men
Reviews.Content: it's good camera worth the money.  only that if i have money will buy a more expensive one. this one doesn't catch moving object clearly.  other than that, it catches still object pretty clearly.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: ANDRES CORTES
Reviews.Content: U gave this camera to my mother and she loves it. It easy to use and portable. Highly recommended for amateurs.

Reviews.Title: i like
Reviews.Author: Jose Raul Roa
Reviews.Content: the camera is good i like canon is small and perfect for work i like ilike i like very very

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Takes good pictures and the flash is stronger than most point and shoot cameras. The flash is over top of the lens eliminating red eye in most cases.

Reviews.Title: Just got this
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: Just received this for an upcoming trip so I haven't had a chance to use it. I do like that it is light but has features of a heavier, more bulky camera. I've had both compact and bulky and wanted something that takes good pictures but is in between. It has a nice zoom and the screen is large. I also like that it is wifi compatible and shoots movies as well. Looking forward to using it in 10 days!

Reviews.Title: Power Shot SX510 HS
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: I am not a professional photographer, so this camera definitely suits my needs. I owned a Canon digital once before, and it took glorious shots. Well, this one does the same thing. The zoom is more than adequate for my needs and allows me to zero right in on my subject. I have not yet used the video, but am anxious to do so when an opportunity arises. The strap is a dickens to put on, though, but I managed it. Yes, I like this camera very much!

Reviews.Title: Love the camera but DID NOT receive the camera bag and 16G memory card promised with purchase
Reviews.Author: Fransou08
Reviews.Content: I love the camera but was very disappointed with my order.  I ordered the camera to have it for New Year's eve and did receive it on time but NO sim card or bag were included in the packaging.  The bag and the sim card were advertised as part of the purchase price.  This is very deceitful!!!

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot Camera was a Christmas gift for my son.
Reviews.Author: Ruth A. Siminski
Reviews.Content: Canon Power Shot Camera was a Christmas gift for my son.  He picked it out and seems to love it.  It came very timely which meant everything to me.  Ruth siminski

Reviews.Title: Canon
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: The Cannon Power Shot is a nice camera. It is very easy to use at a great price. Very happy will the camera.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: ISABELA SANCHEZ
Reviews.Content: this camera is perfect! the size is perfect, the quality of the pictures, everything is perfect. i am in love with this camera

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Tammy Bahmanziari
Reviews.Content: I had a great Canon PowerShot sx170 that I dropped and broke on my last trip.  I was going to order the Canon Sx260 HS to replace it but ordered this one instead.  It was okay but I had a few issues that made me return this item.  First of all, the camera shell is plastic and seemed cheaply made.  I felt that an occasional bump might break the camera easily.  Secondly, the lens cap was separate and manually operated.  On my old sx170 the camera autoclosed the lens cap when you turn off the camera.  Thirdly,  the flash does not pop up automatically.  This is a pain for me.  I don't like the shape of the camera either, the lens is so big and sticks out so far that it could not easily fit in a pocket.  I ordered the Canon sx260 to replace this one.  I think I will be happier with it although the sx260 doesn't have wifi like this one.  I want it primarily for traveling and so these missing features are more important to me.

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Sophieeeeee
Reviews.Content: Just what I needed for unique instagram photos!!!! Plus its small enough to take anywhere and excellent lighting for my shots.

Reviews.Title: Didn't receive the camera bag and 16G memory card promised with purchase
Reviews.Author: Liliana
Reviews.Content: I love the camera but was very disappointed with my order. I ordered the cameraand not sim card or bag were included in the packaging. The bag and the sim card were advertised as part of the purchase price. This is very deceitful!!!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Julie S.
Reviews.Content: This camera was packaged well and is very versatile.  I love the clear definition shots that I can get with the 12.1 MP. I'll use this for many photos for my art work and travel.

Reviews.Title: Camera is really nice but does not come with free Memory card as Amazon says
Reviews.Author: Bryan Blevins
Reviews.Content: Got camera as gift for wife for Christmas, before wrapping it up checked it out, so she wouldn't get a defective gift. Camera works great, does everything as advertised, couldn't be happier. Then I started looking for the FREE memory card that was supposed to be included when I purchased this camera from Amazon. It wasn't there, checked invoice, no memory card listed. Just went back to my order on the website to check and see if I read it wrong. Nope, this is what it says just below the description of camera "Free SanDisk 16 GB Memory Card and Case, Free SanDisk 16 GB memory card and case when you buy this camera from Amazon.com.Shop now". Nowhere does it say to click here to add Memory card to order, so this time I clicked on the card which took me to another page where I had to select the camera and still the memory card is $12. I'm sorry $12 is not free, unless something is done at checkout. Just disappointed in the deceptive way this is advertised to include a free Memory card by Amazon website.

Reviews.Title: Blurry Photos without the flash
Reviews.Author: Bailey
Reviews.Content: Had to return this within a week, Every photo we took was blurry without the flash. My 10 year old canon elph took better photos. Very surprising froma  brand like canon.

Reviews.Title: in my opinion
Reviews.Author: John V. Meagher
Reviews.Content: I haven't had a good camera for quite some time. This PowerShot is a very good camera for all the variety of photo opportunities. A nice deal w great potential.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: joan thomas
Reviews.Content: I like canon products they take very good picture and it is light and easy to caring when you go on long walks I would recommend it

Reviews.Title: Pretty cool camera
Reviews.Author: Dennis E. Nelson "Denny"
Reviews.Content: I have taken 2 pictures and 2 short videos so far.  Everything worked great.  Downloaded smooth to computer.  Still new to this one.  Adventure awaits me.

Reviews.Title: Very Good For the Money
Reviews.Author: David L. Pitzer "Dave"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my sister,very good starter camera for here. She is learning to use it quickly, and has taken a lot of nice photo's.

Reviews.Title: Really nice outfit
Reviews.Author: Lester E. Snyder
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as a prize in a contest we were running for employees. The winner of this prize LOVES this camera outfit. It was exactly what she was hoping for in an SLR camera. I have seen many of the photos take so far with this camera and they are excellent. Makes me want one for myself!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Brenda S. Geist
Reviews.Content: I love my new Canon SX 510 HS 12.1MP with 30 x Optical Zoom.  If you are looking for a good camera check this one out

Reviews.Title: One of the worse camera of all time!!!!
Reviews.Author: Azadeh
Reviews.Content: I decided to buy this camera after doing some research and considering the high rating of this camera I ordered it. I used it last night for the first time and it sucks!!!! There was a party and at least ten non-professional cameras and now when I am sharing the photos with my friends I can see this camera has the worse quality, zoom, color distinction,.... at least while in-door. That was a shock! I went back and checked my old photos from 10 years ago and unbelievable this camera gives the lowest quality photos!! I am so frustrated as just noticed the one month return window is passed otherwise I would have returned it for sure.I tried different setting, lighting,.... but no hope.....I have not used it in natural light but come-on even iphone camera is good in natural light!I still can not believe Canon produced such a failure!!!

Reviews.Title: Happy with Amazon
Reviews.Author: Lloyd
Reviews.Content: I received my camera to give for a gift for Christmas and discovered when opened Christmas morning it had no memory card.To me its like buying a car without a motor,very disappointed with canon,and i did not realize when purchasing it did not come with a memory card.After contacting Amazon they are sending the memory card and case with no charge ,cannot ask for more.I would give a new rating of a 4+Thank you Amazon

Reviews.Title: I was really disappointed to find out the digital camera application is not compatible with my Surface 2 that runs Windows RT
Reviews.Author: Kathy Jenkins
Reviews.Content: I wish this was made clear on Amazon.  The camera's Wi-Fi capability is what sold me.  Unfortunately it doesn't work with my device.  Amazon should disclose this in their description.

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: Anthony daniel
Reviews.Content: The inner ring that you would put a lense or adapter ring comes off. I sent one camera back to be replaced and the same thing happened to the new one. If you buy this. Camera do not buy attachments

Reviews.Title: DID NOT GET FREE CASE OR 16 GM SCAN DISK.
Reviews.Author: Tina Denny
Reviews.Content: WHY IS THE ABOVE NOT COME? NOT HAPPY WITH THAT SINCE IT STATES IT IN THE SELL PAGE. PLEASE RESPOND. A PRESENT FOR MY FATHER WITH OUT THE CASE AND CARD. THANK YOU TINA..MERRY CHRISTMAS

Reviews.Title: Not So Great
Reviews.Author: Gary Hagan
Reviews.Content: I was a little disappointed in this camera.  Hard to understand the settings but of course I am almost 70.  But I consider myself pretty tech savvy.  You have to hold the camera really, really still on the zoom to get a non-blurry picture.  Of course my hands are not as steady as years ago and I have not had this powerful of a zoom before.  I am a concert promoter so when I take pictures of a group on stage I would like to be able to set the camera so it will take clear pictures in bright stage lights.  Hard to focus with this camera unless I figure out a perfect setting.  I would spend more next time for a better camera if I knew what I know now.  Still use it and it is workable but not the quality I wanted.

Reviews.Title: UNABLE TO GET CONNECTED
Reviews.Author: William Barton
Reviews.Content: I think I understand technology.  But so far have not been able to translate what Canon writes into getting my camera connected to my WiFi. WE run a restaurant and want to upload pictyures directly to our Facebook page.Will try again when I have more time.

Reviews.Title: Features have restrictions, no one specified
Reviews.Author: persia
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera over other options for the particular feature of having the wifi connection and  Image Gateway App, I live outside the US but there was no mention on the literature that the App was restricted.I spent the better part of a month in contact with Canon about the issue when they finally told us to contact Canon Latinamerica but they weren't at all helpful.By the time I got done with Canon the dead line to return the camera was almost on me and left me no time to return it.Canon took forever to give me a workable answer and now i feel like they just took the money and ran.

Reviews.Title: DISAPPOINTED..NO MEMORY CARD
Reviews.Author: SuNNy* "amazon lover"
Reviews.Content: I was so happy when my camera arrived in 5 days. But soon I discovered that it did not come with an SD Card. I take photos but cannot view them. Had I known, I would have ordered a card at the same time. I am hoping that this will be the only disappointment. So off I go to read the manual. Ill do an update as soon as I am able to.I am very pleased with photos that I took on the weekend. Only problem I had was zooming in on an object from a few feet away. It would become very blurred. Before anyone says anything, I do not have much experience with cameras. However, I am looking forward to learning and using this camera. :)

Reviews.Title: Apple users, BE FOREWARNED!
Reviews.Author: bkeblen "bkeblen"
Reviews.Content: The wifi on this camera does not work with the current OS X 10.9 (Maverick) operating system on your computer!  Would have been really nice to know that before we spent money on a camera that does not come with a cord for plug in uploading.  Our house has 2 Apple notebooks and one iMac laptop and home wifi, but we can't upload our pics.  It seems to take good pics, but the test will be if/when we can upload and see the enlarged pics on a computer.  Very frustrating!  Canon customer service tells me that the camera will upload to iPhones and iPads, but I keep my pics on my computer.  They also say it will be an estimated 4 months before Canon will get their software updated to Maverick.Update:  I found a cable that fit and uploaded the first 66 pics we took over Thanksgiving.  Posed, still shots look great.  Candid shots are blurry.  And we are not novice photographers.  My last two cameras have been Panasonic Lumix which were great... for awhile, then began losing sharp focus.  We purchased this camera after reading a lot of reviews online, and because our daughter has an amazing Canon PowerShot (but has very little zoom).  We thought we'd found the perfect camera.  But we are sadly disappointed with this camera purchase!

Reviews.Title: Horrible set-up and useless customer service
Reviews.Author: *MB*
Reviews.Content: I was so excited for this camera. I followed the instructions in the book to go to canon.com/cig to set up a gateway account. From there it had me register the product (first option). Turns out you need to set up a gateway account before registering the product (link at the bottom of the page, as opposed to the top "register your product"). If you register your product first, you can never link it to the gateway account, rendering the camera wifi sharing options useless. I called customer service who said there was no way around it, and to change the serial numbers on my gateway account to fudge the system to make it work. I asked if this would then ruin someone else's set-up, but they said "we just want you to change one number." It made no sense, and I feel uncomfortable registering incorrect serial numbers to make a system work.So, brutal set-up required, and then shady customer service from the Canon phone support. I'm returning it and won't be buying another Canon.

Reviews.Title: Wifi?
Reviews.Author: David R. Blane "David R Blane"
Reviews.Content: nearly useless.  I returned it.  If one of the major reasons I got this functions poorly, then it is GONE.

Reviews.Title: TERRIBLE
Reviews.Author: A. Schmidt "Sydney07"
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for about 2 weeks and so far, I'm REALLY sorry I bought it.  Apparently you must have a PhD in order to connect it to WiFi- I have been trying to do this for 2 days now with no luck.  It won't work with internet, it won't work to simply connect it up with a computer.  I have no way of getting to any of my pictures to print them.  Seriously.  I'm so sorry I bought this thing.  If someone has advice, I'd love to know it.  Customer service is about to get a phone call from us and an ear full.  I hope we can return it.  I really don't think it should be that hard to save and print pictures from your computer.  I'm not trying anything fancy here, folks.  Terrible, terrible.

Reviews.Title: Two show stoppers
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: I bought the Canon PowerShot SX20 IS, the forerunner to this one, to take on an Africa photo safari about 4 years ago.  Terrific results!!  It has a 20x optical lens, and for several long range shots I used the digital magnification out to 50x without running into grainy photos.  It uses AA batteries which proved essential when the batteries needed to be changed "out in the bush."Was thinking I'd upgrade to this one, but reading up on the specs leads me to conclude that Canon has taken two big backward steps:  this one has no viewfinder which is critical to finding and photographing the lion at 800 yards!  And going to a rechargeable battery vs AA batteries was the wrong thing to do with this type of camera.  Yes, you could buy a spare rechargeable battery, but I had total confidence in carrying two sets of fresh AA batteries into the bush.  I'll stick with my SX20.

Reviews.Title: Didn't receive 16GB memory card or case as stated
Reviews.Author: David Gallant
Reviews.Content: I'm giving the rating 3 stars for now as I haven't really used the camera because when it was opened on Christmas morning there was no 16GB memory card or carrying case as stated would ship with when I made the order. Somewhat disappoint on that aspect.

Reviews.Title: package incomplete
Reviews.Author: Sergiu
Reviews.Content: I love the camera its a good quality, but the packege comes whithout a usb cable. Luckely i have the old usb cable from anather powershot with its fit, but I'm disappointed.  the box was  unfolded before. otherwise takes good picture, amazing zoom. And I will remain a canon powershot fan.

Reviews.Title: accessory
Reviews.Author: Virginia M Snodgrass
Reviews.Content: Needed a memory card which was not included - should have stated in the order.  Now I need to purchase one before  I can use the camera.  Also, I agree with those who are critical of  Canon and the instruction "manual'!  I finally got Canon to post a pdf  of the "manual" and it needs a simplified version!!

Reviews.Title: Amazon somewhat deceptive on promotion.  Will rate camera after we receive it.
Reviews.Author: Tom Wolter
Reviews.Content: In reading a review about a Canon PowerShot, we are buying as a present, there were numerous complaints about not receiving a 16G card and bag.  This is also true for the  Nikon D5200 we purchased 18 Dec 13.  Neither item was present.  When I questioned the shipper they had no knowledge of the promotion and stated my problem was with Amazon.The camera is great,  somewhat disappointed in Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't give you a memory card
Reviews.Author: Thomas heafy
Reviews.Content: It said in the description that I would recive a memory card with my purchase. I didn't recive a memory card, false advertisement?

Reviews.Title: Beware!!  Misleading Amazon Promotions Need to Stop!!
Reviews.Author: R. Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera as a gift. I received it and realized the camera bag and sd card were missing. So apparently I clicked the wrong place to get free bag and sd card. I was suppose to click a special place to get the free deal...not free if you are getting scammed. Apparently I am not the only one that this happened to!  Shame on Amazon!!  As for the camera...I havent opened it since it is gift...Amazon needs to get its act together.

Reviews.Title: **** BEWARE FRAUDULENT AMAZON PROMOTIONS *******
Reviews.Author: Aman
Reviews.Content: This is not a product review as I am planning to return the camera for deceitful practice by AMAZON. There was a limited time promotion on the camera when I ordered the camera. The bag and the memory card were advertised as part of the purchase price but they were not in the package when I received the camera.When I called the Amazon customer care, they said that they were not aware of promotion as it is no longer available and will have to forward it to their promotion department. The promotion department responded to the query by putting a link to another promotion which said that the bag and card should have been ordered with the camera. SERIOULY AMAZON !!! If you do not mention the brand of the case and card in the promotion how the heck will the customer know what to add. Do you expect us to guess? Also, if there was a promotion and you expected the customer to add the it to the order should you NOT have prompted me to add it if it was missing. Were you expecting to get away with providing the card and case if the customer forgets to add?The next time I called Amazon customer care to challenge the response and the customer care rep responded by apologizing for not having sent the case and card (That's why one star else it would have been no STAR!). But she was not able to send them to me now as the offer had expired and hence cannot be added to the cart to be shipped.The expectation was that AMAZON should have sent the case and card with the package as advertised and not rely on the customer to guess something and add it to order hoping that it will be waived at the time of order confirmation. Hopefully somebody @AMAZON reads the review and they do not advertise such fraudulent promotions in future.

Reviews.Title: At the bottom side of the add it says it comes with a free 16gb memory stick and camara case
Reviews.Author: brett
Reviews.Content: Well, did not get the memory stick or the case.  That is why you get 1 star!  If it was not crunch time for Christmas I would have returned it.  I had to go out and purchase the memory stick and case myself at an additional costs of $44.00.

Reviews.Title: OMG am a victim!
Reviews.Author: Guiramand Louissaint
Reviews.Content: I'm really really disappointed I order this camera and they collected half of the cost price and they never send the camera. I feel like a victim of this situation and yet they never even sent me a message or a notification of the reason why they did this to me. And in the place where I live, money is not easy to earn. I feel like they are abusing me. P.s. It was a friend of mind who gave me is money to buy it for him,,what do I suppose to say to him now?I better find his money to give back to him. OMG!

ProductInfo.Features:
Capture beautiful 1080p full HD video in stereo sound with a dedicated movie button, zoom while shooting and play back videos on an HDTV via the HDMI output
Large 3-inch color LCD with a screen resolution of 461,000 dots enables easy viewing from a wide angle
12.1 megapixel high-sensitivity 1/2.3-inch CMOS sensor combined with the Canon DIGIC 4 image processor
Powerful 30x optical zoom and 24mm wide-angle lens with Optical Image Stabilizer
Smart Auto intelligently selects the proper settings based on 32 predefined shooting situations
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX510 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Optical Zoom and 1080p Full-HD Video
